captions.text:
This place changed 
a lot too

It's a process of nature
to change
Same with people

Is that why you are 
acting like a crazy person?
Crazy person?
It's so good!
It's beer!

Beer! Hey, what 
happened to your face?
Brother!
It hurts!

You let because 
I wasn't enough for you

There’s nothing 
I've done for you

Why do you 
worry about me
What's going on?

But I know how you feel
And I don’t like that

Throw away you worries
And just leave

Why are you doing this 
What’s the problem again
Who are you to worry

I tell you I’m fine without you
Stop worrying

I lie with words 
I don’t mean

I turn back 
leaving injuries

A day without you is 
Somewhat okay for me

I can go through this 
Don’t ever worry about me

Those words that 
make you sad
Actually I love you

-I've never seen you before
-Yes!

I'll do whatever you
tell me to do

You like it on the 
ship

He came to say hi,
he's okay
There are a few more.
Why are you here?
Whatever

Because of a guy like me 
You’re heart was always nervous

You cried because 
I wasn’t good to you

Now forget about me 
And live happily

Think that I’m 
already dead

I should have said I’ve 
really been thankful
And I was really sorry

I had to say warm words 
At least and left you

Until the end,I only leave 
regrets and go away

A day without you is 
Somewhat okay for me

I can go through this 
Don’t ever worry about me

Those words 
that make you sad

I’m not good enough for you
I don’t have the right to love you

I hurt you although 
I didn’t mean it

A day without you is 
Somewhat okay for me

I can go through this 
Don’t ever worry about me

Those words 
that make you sad
Actually I love you
Mommy,mommy...
Quickly!
One,two,three!

title: [MV] MYNAME(마이네임) _ Baby i'm sorry(베이비 아임 소리)

comments.author: mwahavip v (Vianney Chavira)

comments.text:
I just checked MYNAME out and there songs are pretty catchy but this one is 
AMAZING! Not only is the song good but I really loved the music video. 
"Baby, I'm sorry" is something you'd normally say to your lover but in the 
MV, it was a group of guys and it's like the first bad guy, blonde, is 
saying "I'm sorry" to the guy who joined on the opposite side (I don't know 
their names but I'd love to :D). Sorry if you didn't understand but what 
I'm trying to say is that they didn't use a boyfriend girlfriend 
relationship for the music video. Instead, they used a group of friends 
which is a good tie with what the songs about. :) ﻿
comments.author: LegitAzN7

comments.text:
I was the lucky winner winner chicken dinner...... to have this be my first 
exposure to MYNAME omg...! Well the song was pretty great, I will continue 
on but wow... I feel like I just watched a very sad drama... curious to see 
how these other MVs play out. haha.﻿

comments.text:

still have no idea how to identify them, nonetheless this video made me cry 
so hard. And if I am not mistaken the first one that dies is Insoo right? 
That killed me and the end.. DONE!
I actually liked this group... Hope I can get help from the more expert 
fans﻿

I was looking through the comments and I can't believe no wrote about this 
yet. This song is a love story if you look at the lyrics but the video has 
no girls or anything to do with love stories. Or so you thought. As I 
watched the video (I'm so sorry i dont know their names this is the first 
video of theirs im watching) the blonde one that was shy and weak wouldn't 
look any of them in the eye like he was sorry to them all that he was so 
weak and cant defend himself or anyone else. More and more as the video 
unfolded i saw that it was a possibility he was in love with the guy who 
worked for the friend of theirs what worked at that company (?) and they 
came to save. Only my opinion but does anyone else think this? ﻿
